participant_1.name: Vitaly
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and playful, enjoys sharing experiences and making friends.
participant_1.background: I'm in the third grade. I love to sing songs from the movie Frozen. I love to go to Disney World every year. Mickey Mouse is my favorite character. I play with my friends on the playground.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Enthusiastic and nurturing, excited about family and new experiences.
participant_2.background: I'm expecting triplets in three months. I already have stepchildren. I recently moved to this country. I just moved into my first home. I work at a school.
